name: generate-secrets
description: Generate secret variables for the strings specified based on the secret preferences

scripts.task1: pushd "tasks/secrets-for-strings/secrets-for-stringsV1" && npm install && npm dedupe && npm prune --production && popd
scripts.task2: pushd "tasks/publish-secrets-to-kv/publish-secrets-to-kvV1" && npm install && npm dedupe && npm prune --production && popd
scripts.ready: npm install && npm run task1 && npm run task2
scripts.copy: npm run clean-dist && copyfiles "./tasks/**/!(*.ts|*.js.map|package-lock.json)" dist && copyfiles vss-extension.json LICENSE *.md dist && copyfiles images/** dist

author: onlyutkarsh
